content: I think I'll try checking for markings and examining the color first. If I'm still unsure, I might take it to a jeweler for an appraisal. But yeah, at the end of the day, it's the thought that counts, and I'm just happy to have such a beautiful piece of jewelry from my boyfriend. Thanks for the tips! By the way, can you recommend some good fashion bloggers or influencers who focus on affordable fashion, like H&M and Zara? I'd love to get some inspiration for my everyday style.
